attributes.action: support the banning of the excesive violent videogames (such as Manhunt), as a way of protecting society and the construction of common good.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The objective of this petition is to show our full support to the decision of banning Manhunt (a sadistic videogame).  We desire to make clear our opposition to the petitions and movements (and therefore we ask that they are ignored) that support excesive violent, sadistic, videogames (different of the movies by its interactivity)

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
